favourite.article: "For also in one Spirit were we all baptized into one Body, .... and were all given to drink one Spirit" (1 Cor. 12:13). "But he who is joined to the Lord is one spirit." (1 Cor. 6:17) Hallelujah! We are one in the Father through His life, one in Christ Jesus the Son, and one in the Spirit through our mingled spirit. We are one in the Triune God!
